mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (userId, userName, userPwd, email, tel, birth) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userName}, #{userPwd}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{birth})
mapper.select: SELECT userId, userName, userPwd, created_date, modify_date, last_login, NVL(enabled, 0) enabled, email, tel, TO_CHAR(birth, 'YYYY-MM-DD') birth FROM member WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET userPwd=#{userPwd}, enabled=#{enabled}, email=#{email}, tel=#{tel}, birth=#{birth}, modify_date=SYSDATE WHERE userId=#{userId}
UPDATE member SET last_login=SYSDATE WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT userId, authority FROM memberAuthority WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE memberAuthority SET authority=#{authority} WHERE userId=#{userId} AND authority=#{oldAuthority}
